sentences: Parima koha saanu on meistritiitli võitnud sportlane.
context: The word 'parima' is the superlative form of the Estonian adjective 'parem' (good/better). It means 'the best' or refers to someone who has achieved first place or won an absolute victory. In the dictionary definition provided, it specifically mentions 'absoluutvõitja' (absolute winner) and connects it to someone who has won the best position in competition classes.
